SEARCH
Package view.Doctor.records

Class DoctorPatientsUnderCareView

java.lang.Object
view.View
view.Doctor.records.DoctorPatientsUnderCareView
public class DoctorPatientsUnderCareView extends View
DoctorPatientsUnderCareView is a View that allows doctors to view the patients under their care. Doctors can select a patient to view and manage their medical records.
Since:
2024-11-17
